explains: adj. 重复乏味的；多次重复的
wordGroup: repetitive strain injury （肢体的）重复性劳损

sentences.en: These tasks were repetitive, lengthy and lacking any intrinsic interest.
sentences.cn: 这些作业重复冗长，没有什么意义。

sentences.en: This technique is particularly successful where problems occur as the result of repetitive movements.
sentences.cn: 这项技术的成功之处在于能解决重复运动引起的问题。

sentences.en: Computers can relieve us of boring and repetitive tasks.
sentences.cn: 电脑可以使我们从枯燥重复的工作中解脱出来。
